title: Why use Dieta?
description: A weekly plan helps you loss weight easily!

title: How it works?
description: Based on your weight, your life style, and the speed of losing weight, calculate the daily calorie.

title: Nutrition
description: A high level protein is needed to prevent a muscle losing. Also the carbohydrate is remained to maintain our body function.

title: Weekly adjustment
description: According to your losing rate, life style, tiredness to decide the next move.
